page.title: 09FARMS IN THE AREA
page.content: MANOR HOUSE FARM WELLINGHAM The major crop on this farm is winter wheat. Winter barley, spring barley and winter beans are also grown. The owner has removed some hedges but has planted areas of woodland to compen- sate. He has 3 horses for his children to ride & a JackRussell dog with pups. MANOR FARM WELLINGHAM Winter wheat is the major crop on this farm too. Spring and winter bar- ley, oilseed rape and sugar beet are grown.The farmhouse is privately owned and the land owner farms from Tittle- shall. UPHOUSE FARM RAYNHAM Spring wheat and barley are the major crops. There is 1 small field of peas and 1 of potatoes.4,500 chickens are being reared in a litter house. The farmer's wife runs a pet food shop and she also rears Old English sheepdogs.
